mapper.sql: customer_id, customer_mobile, openid, lat, lon, nick_name, head_img, created, created_by, created_by_name, updated, updated_by, updated_by_name, session_key, status,token
mapper.select:
select * from customer_user_info where status =1 and customer_id in
#{id}

select cui.customer_id,cui.nick_name,cui.customer_mobile,cui.openid,cui.status,sui.store_name,cui.head_img,cui.created from customer_user_info cui left join customer_store_relation csr on cui.customer_id = csr.customer_id left join store_user_info sui on csr.store_user_id = sui.id
and cui.customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and cui.nick_name like CONCAT('%', #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and cui.customer_mobile like CONCAT('%', #{customerMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and cui.openid like CONCAT('%', #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and cui.status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and sui.store_name like CONCAT('%', #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into customer_user_info (customer_id, customer_mobile, openid, lat, lon, nick_name, head_img, created, created_by, created_by_name, updated, updated_by, updated_by_name, session_key, status,token) values (#{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{customerMobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{openid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updatedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sessionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
